attributes.additional_details:
Domestic Abuse happens everyday. Safe places for women & children are becoming few and far between.

The Haven Wolverhampton is facing a large cut to it's funding.

This could effect the vital ongoing support The Haven gives to women and children effected by domestic abuse.

The Haven gives women & children the opportunity of education, money & debt advice, legal advice and more importantly a safe haven free from Domestic Abuse.

It is important that we raise awareness of Domestic Abuse and the impact these possible cuts will have to women & children past, present and future.
